name: Hannibal: Rome and Carthage in the Second Punic War
name_original: Hannibal: Rome and Carthage in the Second Punic War
description:
Hannibal: Rome and Carthage in the Second Punic War is a strategy game developed by Forced March Games. It came out on 21-09-2010. Matrix Games published the game.
Hannibal: Rome and Carthage in the Second Punic War is available on PC.
